titles: A plea for Sr George Booth, and the Cheshire gentlemen Briefly stated in a letter to Sir Arthur Hesillrigge. / By an unbiassed friend of truth and peace.
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
Hesilrige, Arthur, Sir, d. 1661.
notes: Signed at end: W.P., i.e., William Prynne.
Sr George Booth = George Booth, Baron Delamer.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 19. 1659."; "Honest" before 'W.P.'; "rin" following 'W.P.'
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Delamer, George Booth, --  Baron, 1622-1684 --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
